title: kanavilAghiyum vanden
sahitya:
kanavilAghilum vanden kali tIrkkalAgAdO kanaka sabhai appanE


anupallavi

  manadu sancalappaTTu marundonrum ariyAmal dinam iraivA unaiyE deNDaniTTu kUvinEn 


caraNam    kuncita pAdattai piDittEn en kuraigaLai sholli kaNNIr vaDittEn
tanjamenru kai ennai viDuttEn shiva tAraka nAmamE paDittEn
vanca muyalganai vATTiya pAdanE vAtavUrArkkoDi kATTiya vEdanE
nanjai nayandamarar nalivu tIr nAthanE nAnAnenavuLLE naTamiDum bOdhanE
